# vendor_code

**Instance Property**

After making the SIOCGKEVVENDOR ioctl call, this will be filled in with the vendor code if there is one.

## Declaration

```swift
u_int32_t vendor_code;
```

## Fields

- **vendor_string**: A bundle style identifier.
title: vendor_code
